QuestData.Title: The Fall of Ga'trul
QuestData.Description: Alright $glad:lass;. We've taken enough jabs at this warlock army... now it's time to cut off the head.$b$bGa'trul's back there, in that big ol' temple ruin. Give him a good what-for, and the Horde will have lost its last stake here in Pandaria.
QuestData.RewardText: Sha...$b$bFighting the Horde on a foreign shore is hard enough.
